title: Israel & Middle East News
description:
Finally! Unbiased and full coverage of news & videos about Israel, the Middle East and the Jewish community in one place.
All the news brought to you in English from top-notch sources! Stay up to date on what you want! The app allows you to follow all the key topics of the day - politics, national policy, the local markets, and more.
Features include:
- Balanced coverage from top & prominent sources covering Israel and the middle east.
- Clean feed with no repeated stories. For any story - you can see all of the sources that covered it with a simple tap.
- Push notifications for prominent stories! Stay up to date at all times (optional)!
- No configuration. Value from the first moment.
- An awesome new widget!
- Your very own news feed - choose the topics you want to follow and/or the topics you want blocked! Don't bother yourself with news that aren't of interest to you!
- You can now block any source you don't like! Simply long-tap the article and block it!
- Various videos of Israel news, politics, science, tech, entertainment and much more brought to you from the popular Youtube channels.
- A community for Israel supporters! Post stories or polls, comment on stories, and tag articles!
- Read Later - found an article you want to read and didn't have time? Save it free and inside the app for further reading!
Full satisfaction guaranteed! And all this for free!
Enjoying the app? Not satisfied? Whatever it is - we’re waiting to hear from you. Please write us what’s on your mind to support@newsfusion.com
Use of the Newsfusion Application is governed by the Newsfusion Terms of Use (http://newsfusion.com/terms-privacy-policy).
